home.title: Gabriele Tomasso
home.subtitle: Developer - UI/UX Designer - Graphic Designer
home.description: Specialized in developing modern web applications with React and Node.js, with experience in generative AI and a solid background in graphic design.
home.aboutText: I'm currently specialized in developing modern web applications with React, Node.js, and both SQL and NoSQL databases. My experience as a developer intern at NewMediaADV allowed me to deepen my knowledge in the field of generative AI, developing innovative tools and AI agents through n8n technology. I combine technical programming skills (Java, C#, Unity, React) with a solid background in graphic design (Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma), allowing me to create complete solutions that integrate functionality and aesthetics.
